title: Xian Feng Jian Yu Lu
alternative_title: Chronicles of Everlasting Wind and Sword Rain, 仙风剑雨录
description: In ancient Shenzhou, humans and demons had been in constant dispute for thousands of years. The demon princess from Tushan, Bai Binglan, and the human Zhang Kuangyun met each other due to a misunderstanding. In order to investigate the enemy country, Bai Binglan became Zhang Kuangyun's companion. As they travel together, Zhang Kuangyun discovers a conspiracy...
